about_the_game:
The soundtrack to Tracks: The Train Set Game features 13 beautiful piano pieces. The dulcet tones of this soundtrack rewards your ears and brings your mind back to a much simpler time... When you used to play with small wooden trains and track pieces.

Track Listing

  • Apartment Theme 01
  • Apartment Theme 02
  • Apartment Theme 03
  • Apartment Theme 04
  • Bedroom 01
  • Bedroom 02
  • Bedroom 03
  • Bedroom 04
  • Bedroom 05
  • Casual Ride
  • Christmas
  • Christmas Trailer
  • Commute
  • Distant Childhood
  • Honeymoon
  • Night Theme 01
  • Night Theme 02
  • Night Theme 03
  • Peaceful Building Mood
  • Winter 01
  • Winter 02
  • Winter 03

    Credits

    Kevin Gallagher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
